name: Zahalia
description: Zahalia was a peaceful land until The Dark Wizard came and stole all the crystals. Defeat his group of monsters and reclaim the Crystals to save Zahalia from darkness.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.27 Ghz Memory: 120 MB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory Storage: 104 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
